text: Need to ventI posted on this subreddit six whole months ago about how I was feeling more and more suicidal  and I still feel exactly the same  I ve felt suicidal for most of my life  so it isn t a new feeling  but it s gotten a lot harder to deal with as I get older  I m twenty five  and a big reason for feeling suicidal has always been that I ve ruined my life and haven t done anything worthwhile   I know that it s not always rational  because I literally remember telling myself in the fourth grade that if I didn t write a book by the time I graduated middle school  I would be a failure  My brother is a genius and has been famous and successful since he was literally a child  and I ve always known I can never compare to him   I feel exactly how I did as a suicidal teenager  except now I don t have the professional support system or  frankly  the sympathy  I have a lot of loving people in my life that i m so grateful for  but they ve been hearing the same shit from me forever  I don t blame them  but I feel so alone with my feelings now  I m so scared of feeling like this for decades  with less and less sympathy from the people around me   I really don t want to die  but I think I might want to not be alive more if that makes sense  and I m just miserable
summary: As I get older, I find it harder to deal with the fact that I'm suicidal. I feel like I've ruined my life and haven't done anything worthwhile. My brother is a genius and has been famous and successful since he was a child. I can't compare to him. I have a lot of loving people in my life.

text: Every single belief I ve ever had betrayed meI remember when I was younger  and I was   sure on my beliefs  Respect people  help people  obey my elders and teachers  study and be a good boy  don t drink  smoke or do drugs  forgive when others hurt me  ignore negative things and focus on the positive ones  etc Now  I don t know what s true or false  for almost all of those beliefs failed me  I m a prime example that having good grades doesn t mean that you ll triumph in life If almost everyone I used to know moved on without me  or I kept losing friends  either by conflicts or just letting them fade away into acquaintances  then that must mean I m in the wrong  or at least  I hold most of the blame Sometimes  I m angry at my family  Because they raised me with old fashioned beliefs  and they overprotected me a lot when I was younger  But at least they didn t have malicious intentions and I know that they tried to do their best Also  I m angry at my old high school classmates  They did everything they wanted to me  as they bullied me  manipulated me  used me as a tool  ignored me or treated me like trash  and now I m the one who needs to pick up the pieces  the one who s wrong when I say that the pain is too much  or get told that I act like a victim In this quarantine  I ve realized that I m more alone than I ve ever been before  And I realized I lost most of my good qualities Before  I would have said that I would ve been there for another person no matter what  but now  My fear of rejection is stronger than my wish to talk to other people If other people already moved on  and I went to apologize or to reconnect  they would probably think I m making everything about me  thus I would make things even worse I m the problem  it s a very easy answer   I m the problem  I ve always been the problem I was stupid  so stupid
summary: Every belief I have ever had betrayed me. I am angry at my family, my high school classmates and myself. I lost most of my good qualities and I am more alone than ever before. I would have been there for another person no matter what, but I am afraid of rejection.
cleaned: belief betray angry family high school classmate lose good quality person no matter afraid rejection

text: I can t do this anymoreI hope my nephew grows up and finds happiness somewhere  I hope my sister pays off her debt  I hope my mother finds happiness  she deserves it more than anyone  I m sure they won t understand  I was never ready for any of this and it s all starting to crash down around me  All I can see is how hollow my life has become  There s no way out of here and I m starting to drown in my head  Please  For the love of god somebody help me  I can t do this alone anymore  I have no one else to turn to  Please help me
summary: I was never ready for any of this and it's all starting to crash down around me. I hope my nephew grows up and finds happiness somewhere and I hope that my sister pays off her debt. I have no one else to turn to.
cleaned: ready start crash hope nephew grow find happiness hope sister pay debt no turn

text: Dating a narcissistic or am I just a terrible person So I m not really the best writer  So bare with me please  I met this girl around this month last year  And we ve been dating until well probably today  Basically during the relationship I was pretty fucked up  I did contact my ex at one point and that caused a big wall in our relationship  But since then I ve done nothing but try to prove myself to her  I ve been trying to change when she d tell me I m doing something wrong or I m not doing anything at all  When it would come to me telling her how she treats me she would turn it around and say things like  well if you didn t say that then I wouldn t act this way  The things I would tell her were mainly about how she treats me  She would get aggressive with me  She s tried to kick me but blamed it because I was holding her and she doesn t like to be held when upset  We tried to give us another chance and I d say things like do you want to give me another chance   And in response she d say  you get what you want  When I express how I dislike my life sometimes she says I m just playing a pity party  But when she tells me how she s going to kill herself and doesn t respond until the next day  I m constantly just calling her and get no response  She says she can t act the same with me because of how I treated her  I m pretty sure I was a good man to her  She only expresses how I ve hurt her  But when I bring up my feelings they are always belittled  I could possibly be the terrible person she thinks I am  And it makes me want to die  Seriously  I never thought someone could make someone hate themselves so much  And think they are always the problem  Literally every argument we ve had was about what I did and didn t do
summary: During the relationship with the girl he met this month last year, he was pretty messed up and he did contact his ex at one point. Since then he's been trying to prove himself to her to change their relationship. She would get aggressive with him, she tried to kick him and she doesn't like to be held when upset. When he expresses his feelings, she belittles them. She doesn't respond to his calls.
cleaned: relationship girl meet month year pretty messed contact sex point try prove change relationship aggressive try kick not like hold upset express feeling belittle not respond call
